about.title: About me
about.description: I'm a backend developer specialized in Java and Spring Boot, with experience building secure microservices, integrating external services, and implementing design patterns. Although my strength is backend, I also build attractive interfaces with React and have a deep understanding of frontend work. My focus is creating solid, scalable, and maintainable solutions.
